2053.subject: HDEV
2053.descrlong: Focuses on psychological, biological cognitive, and other ecological theories in examining adolescent development. Emphasizes the impact of culture and context on identity development and on successful transition to adulthood. Requires completion of a community service project. Human Development minor and Child Development concentration course. Aligns with LS MLOs 1,3,4,7. Formerly LS 365S. (Offered only as interest warrants.)
